Html:
Hi

This Naudio is so cool!

But i am fond that in project home page ,there is a snapshot about Naudio demo,which contain

a visualisation spectrum, but when i download the codes,i found any code to do these?

My question is that: How to use Naudio to draw visualisation spectrum? Is there any interface ?

Does it can support realtime drawing?

 

Best regards

Have a look at the source code for the NAudioDemo project, which will show you how to do this

Mark
